Premiere Manpower Services Provider

Timeline Manpower Services has been supplying professional and skilled labor in Angeles City, Pampanga since August 2008. We specialize in creating and delivering services to medium and large size enterprises in the booming local hospitality industry.

Our Core Business focus on Human Resource Outsourcing and currently we provide various innovative outsourcing services to various clients. We are a team of dedicated professionals who work hard to maintain and meet the expectations of our clients.

Timeline Manpower Services is an outsourcing provider that helps businesses to grow and achieve greater sustainability by providing high quality staffs, facilities, and ease of recruitment, HR, and payroll.

Established in August 2008 with over 13 years of experience, we have continuously provided quality manpower service across Pampanga (Philippines). And now we are embarking the year with a challenge to cater to BPO Services.

Mission

  • To establish partnership with all prospective client and to sustain quality and productive service.
  • To provide reliable and quality manpower services to businesses’ manpower requirements.
  • To ensure excellence in the quality of work and provide service to clients by providing proper training and development to employees, proper and adequate tools. Systems that are in place for smooth operation and promoting a culture of excellence in the company.
  • Assist in national development by providing jobs to the unemployed.

Vision

We will be the preferred manpower service provider because of our professional partnership with our clientele.

We will be one of the top service providers in catering manpower services locally and internationally because we protect the welfare of our people.

Why Choose Us?

As a legitimate independent service contractor, we always value our commitment to our clientele. We ensure that the company is compliant on all labor law and standards. Thus we partner with our clients to attain growth and development and to achieve each other’s corporate goal.
